title: Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - Count, Letters & Link (3in1) | Math, Words, Magnetic Blocks, Puzzles | 4-10 Years STEM Toys | Gift Boys & Girls (Works with iPads, iPhones, Samsung tabs, Kindle Fire)
descriptions:
Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu – Count, Letters & Link (3-in-1)

Turn screen time into skill time with an AR-powered learning kit that blends hands-on play with engaging games. The Plugo STEM Pack includes three award-winning kits—Plugo Count, Plugo Letters, and Plugo Link—plus a foldable, magnetic gamepad that holds your device. Kids aged 4–10 build math, vocabulary, and problem-solving skills through interactive challenges that adapt from pre-K to Grade 4, with no in-app purchases required.

What’s included
- 3 Plugo kits: Count, Letters, and Link
- 1 Plugo Gamepad (foldable mat with device slot and embedded magnets)
- Free Plugo app (no ads, no in-app purchases)
- Device not included

Why kids and parents love it
- AR-powered learning: Solve problems with real magnetic blocks that the app recognizes in real time.
- 15 interactive games, 750+ levels: Progressive challenges that grow with your child from pre-K to Grade 4.
- Skill-building play: Develops counting, arithmetic, vocabulary, spelling, comprehension, problem-solving, and fine-motor skills.
- Broad STEM focus: Math, engineering thinking, and linguistic abilities.
- Gift-ready for boys and girls ages 4–10.

Educational focus
- Math: Counting, addition, subtraction, and early arithmetic with Plugo Count.
- Words: Spelling, vocabulary, and language comprehension with Plugo Letters.
- Puzzles: Logic, spatial reasoning, and engineering-style builds with Plugo Link.

App details
- Platforms: App Store and Play Store
- Content: 15 games, 750+ levels
- Adaptive learning: Pre-K to Grade 4
- Cost: Free app, no in-app purchases

Compatibility
- iOS: iPhone 6 & above, iPad 5th Gen & above
  - Not supported: iPad Mini 1, iPad Pro 12.9”
- Android: OS 8 & above, 2GB RAM & above, front camera at the top centre
  - Not supported: Tablets 10 inches & above
- Amazon Fire tablets: Fire 7 (2022), Fire HD 8 (2018 & 2020), Fire HD 8+ (2020)
- For the latest device list, check the PlayShifu compatibility dashboard on their website.

Perfect for
- Hands-on learners who thrive with tactile, screen-guided activities
- Parents seeking engaging, educational screen time without extra purchases
- Classrooms, homeschooling, travel, and rainy-day enrichment

Give kids a head start in math, language, and problem-solving with the Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu—where magnetic blocks meet immersive AR games to make learning irresistibly fun.
